about_the_game:
Your ship crashed on an uninhabited planet, you need to get resources and repair the ship.

You need oxygen, for this you need to extract water and create oxygen bottles, then take the bottle and point it at the astronaut to replenish the supply of oxygen. If the oxygen runs out, you will die.

Collect various resources by moving around the planet with the left mouse button, find resources, mine, related to the ship and craft spare parts for the ship from them.

There are several types of resources, different parts of the ship need different resources growing on the planet, the player needs to look for these resources, mine them, and build spare parts for the ship from combinations of these resources.

When you collect all the parts of the ship, the game will end.

A light meditative game in which you can relax.
detailed_description:
Your ship crashed on an uninhabited planet, you need to get resources and repair the ship.

You need oxygen, for this you need to extract water and create oxygen bottles, then take the bottle and point it at the astronaut to replenish the supply of oxygen. If the oxygen runs out, you will die.

Collect various resources by moving around the planet with the left mouse button, find resources, mine, related to the ship and craft spare parts for the ship from them.

There are several types of resources, different parts of the ship need different resources growing on the planet, the player needs to look for these resources, mine them, and build spare parts for the ship from combinations of these resources.

When you collect all the parts of the ship, the game will end.

A light meditative game in which you can relax.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Space Crafting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
